“You mustn’t enter that forest.”

When the “Collector” visited for the first time,
There had been a small private house there
He erected in that spot
A small theater furnished with a clocktower

When he demolished the private house,
He discovered two bleached skeletons
He created a graveyard next to the theater
And gave them a proper burial

The wineglass…
The spoon…
The doll…
The mirrors…

The scissors…
The sword…

What? There’s one missing?
